chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: So king Solomon was king over all Israel.
items.plainText: So king Solomon was king over all Israel.

items.text: And these were the princes which he had; Azariah the son of Zadok the priest,
items.plainText: And these were the princes which he had; Azariah the son of Zadok the priest,

items.text: Elihoreph and Ahiah, the sons of Shisha, scribes; Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, the recorder.
items.plainText: Elihoreph and Ahiah, the sons of Shisha, scribes; Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, the recorder.

items.text: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the host: and Zadok and Abiathar were the priests:
items.plainText: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the host: and Zadok and Abiathar were the priests:

items.text: And Azariah the son of Nathan was over the officers: and Zabud the son of Nathan was principal officer, and the king's friend:
items.plainText: And Azariah the son of Nathan was over the officers: and Zabud the son of Nathan was principal officer, and the king's friend:

items.text: And Ahishar was over the household: and Adoniram the son of Abda was over the tribute.
items.plainText: And Ahishar was over the household: and Adoniram the son of Abda was over the tribute.

items.text: And Solomon had twelve officers over all Israel, which provided victuals for the king and his household: each man his month in a year made provision.
items.plainText: And Solomon had twelve officers over all Israel, which provided victuals for the king and his household: each man his month in a year made provision.

items.text: And these are their names: The son of Hur, in mount Ephraim:
items.plainText: And these are their names: The son of Hur, in mount Ephraim:

items.text: The son of Dekar, in Makaz, and in Shaalbim, and Beth-shemesh, and Elon-beth-hanan:
items.plainText: The son of Dekar, in Makaz, and in Shaalbim, and Beth-shemesh, and Elon-beth-hanan:

items.text: The son of Hesed, in Aruboth; to him pertained Sochoh, and all the land of Hepher:
items.plainText: The son of Hesed, in Aruboth; to him pertained Sochoh, and all the land of Hepher:

items.text: The son of Abinadab, in all the region of Dor; which had Taphath the daughter of Solomon to wife:
items.plainText: The son of Abinadab, in all the region of Dor; which had Taphath the daughter of Solomon to wife:

items.text: Baana the son of Ahilud; to him pertained Taanach and Megiddo, and all Beth-shean, which is by Zartanah beneath Jezreel, from Beth-shean to Abel-meholah, even unto the place that is beyond Jokneam:
items.plainText: Baana the son of Ahilud; to him pertained Taanach and Megiddo, and all Beth-shean, which is by Zartanah beneath Jezreel, from Beth-shean to Abel-meholah, even unto the place that is beyond Jokneam:

items.text: The son of Geber, in Ramoth-gilead; to him pertained the towns of Jair the son of Manasseh, which are in Gilead; to him also pertained the region of Argob, which is in Bashan, threescore great cities with walls and brasen bars:
items.plainText: The son of Geber, in Ramoth-gilead; to him pertained the towns of Jair the son of Manasseh, which are in Gilead; to him also pertained the region of Argob, which is in Bashan, threescore great cities with walls and brasen bars:

items.text: Ahinadab the son of Iddo had Mahanaim:
items.plainText: Ahinadab the son of Iddo had Mahanaim:

items.text: Ahimaaz was in Naphtali; he also took Basmath the daughter of Solomon to wife:
items.plainText: Ahimaaz was in Naphtali; he also took Basmath the daughter of Solomon to wife:

items.text: Baanah the son of Hushai was in Asher and in Aloth:
items.plainText: Baanah the son of Hushai was in Asher and in Aloth:

items.text: Jehoshaphat the son of Paruah, in Issachar:
items.plainText: Jehoshaphat the son of Paruah, in Issachar:

items.text: Shimei the son of Elah, in Benjamin:
items.plainText: Shimei the son of Elah, in Benjamin:

items.text: Geber the son of Uri was in the country of Gilead, in the country of Sihon king of the Amorites, and of Og king of Bashan; and he was the only officer which was in the land.
items.plainText: Geber the son of Uri was in the country of Gilead, in the country of Sihon king of the Amorites, and of Og king of Bashan; and he was the only officer which was in the land.

items.text: Judah and Israel were many, as the sand which is by the sea in multitude, eating and drinking, and making merry.
items.plainText: Judah and Israel were many, as the sand which is by the sea in multitude, eating and drinking, and making merry.

items.text: And Solomon reigned over all kingdoms from the river unto the land of the Philistines, and unto the border of Egypt: they brought presents, and served Solomon all the days of his life.
items.plainText: And Solomon reigned over all kingdoms from the river unto the land of the Philistines, and unto the border of Egypt: they brought presents, and served Solomon all the days of his life.

items.text: And Solomon's provision for one day was thirty measures of fine flour, and threescore measures of meal,
items.plainText: And Solomon's provision for one day was thirty measures of fine flour, and threescore measures of meal,

items.text: Ten fat oxen, and twenty oxen out of the pastures, and an hundred sheep, beside harts, and roebucks, and fallowdeer, and fatted fowl.
items.plainText: Ten fat oxen, and twenty oxen out of the pastures, and an hundred sheep, beside harts, and roebucks, and fallowdeer, and fatted fowl.

items.text: For he had dominion over all the region on this side the river, from Tiphsah even to Azzah, over all the kings on this side the river: and he had peace on all sides round about him.
items.plainText: For he had dominion over all the region on this side the river, from Tiphsah even to Azzah, over all the kings on this side the river: and he had peace on all sides round about him.

items.text: And Judah and Israel dwelt safely, every man under his vine and under his fig tree, from Dan even to Beer-sheba, all the days of Solomon.
items.plainText: And Judah and Israel dwelt safely, every man under his vine and under his fig tree, from Dan even to Beer-sheba, all the days of Solomon.

items.text: And Solomon had forty thousand stalls of horses for his chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen.
items.plainText: And Solomon had forty thousand stalls of horses for his chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen.

items.text: And those officers provided victual for king Solomon, and for all that came unto king Solomon's table, every man in his month: they lacked nothing.
items.plainText: And those officers provided victual for king Solomon, and for all that came unto king Solomon's table, every man in his month: they lacked nothing.

items.text: Barley also and straw for the horses and dromedaries brought they unto the place where the officers were, every man according to his charge.
items.plainText: Barley also and straw for the horses and dromedaries brought they unto the place where the officers were, every man according to his charge.

items.text: And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much, and largeness of heart, even as the sand that is on the sea shore.
items.plainText: And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much, and largeness of heart, even as the sand that is on the sea shore.

items.text: And Solomon's wisdom excelled the wisdom of all the children of the east country, and all the wisdom of Egypt.
items.plainText: And Solomon's wisdom excelled the wisdom of all the children of the east country, and all the wisdom of Egypt.

items.text: For he was wiser than all men; than Ethan the Ezrahite, and Heman, and Chalcol, and Darda, the sons of Mahol: and his fame was in all nations round about.
items.plainText: For he was wiser than all men; than Ethan the Ezrahite, and Heman, and Chalcol, and Darda, the sons of Mahol: and his fame was in all nations round about.

items.text: And he spake three thousand proverbs: and his songs were a thousand and five.
items.plainText: And he spake three thousand proverbs: and his songs were a thousand and five.

items.text: And he spake of trees, from the cedar tree that is in Lebanon even unto the hyssop that springeth out of the wall: he spake also of beasts, and of fowl, and of creeping things, and of fishes.
items.plainText: And he spake of trees, from the cedar tree that is in Lebanon even unto the hyssop that springeth out of the wall: he spake also of beasts, and of fowl, and of creeping things, and of fishes.

items.text: And there came of all people to hear the wisdom of Solomon, from all kings of the earth, which had heard of his wisdom.
items.plainText: And there came of all people to hear the wisdom of Solomon, from all kings of the earth, which had heard of his wisdom.
